calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Radioactive Waste Management
calendar-event-select-committee.location: Committee Room G, Palace of Westminster
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Professor Robert Pickard, Chairman, Professor William Lee, Deputy Chairman, Ms Marion Hill, Member, CoRWM; and The Rt Hon Lord Hunt of Kings Heath, Minister of State, Department of Energy and Climate Change.

calendar-event-select-committee.committee-name: EU Sub-Committee A: Economic and Financial Affairs, and International Trade
calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Derivatives
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Mr Eraj Shirvani, Chairman, and Mr Richard Metcalfe, Global Head of Policy, International Swaps and Derivatives Association (ISDA); and Roger Liddell, Chief Executive, LCH.Clearnet.
